com.igeekinc.util.discburning.remote

Interface RemoteDiscBurning

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RemoteDiscBurningImpl

    public interface RemoteDiscBurning
extends java.rmi.Remote
    DiscBurning remote is an internal interface for supporting remote DiscBurning operations. Use DiscBurningRemoteProxy which provides an implementation of DiscBurning on top of this RMI interface

                                         java.rmi.RemoteException
        Creates a new volume to record to. When the volume is ready to be burnt, pass it to burnVolume
        Parameters:
